[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@dinofe/xt-core](./xt-core.md) &gt; [Big](./xt-core.big.md)

## Big variable

解决JS计算精度问题的类

**Signature:**

```typescript
Big: import("big.js").BigConstructor
```

## Remarks


## Example


```ts
import { Big } from '@dinofe/xt-core/common'
x = new Big(123.4567)
y = Big('123456.7e-3')                 // 'new' is optional
z = new Big(x)
x.eq(y) && x.eq(z) && y.eq(z)          // true
```
